entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
